channel.title: In trouble for being more advanced then my ICT teacher
channel.description:
So i went school a couple days back to find out in ICT (Computing for short) i had a evaluation (sorta like a test/essay); so i got to work and started answering the question, now i aint the cleverest guy and i admit it but the next bit is fucked up. The second question was "what forms does information come in"; now i thought back when my teacher told me: images, text and numerals are all types of this, so i typed something similar to the extract below; brackets were not in the extract it self.
"Information may come in various different forms, including Integers (as numbers); which come in forms of upto 128bit; an average 32bit Integer which is signed can hold up to the range of '-2,147,483,647 - 2,147,483,648' (maybe the other way around lol); information may also come in graphics such as bitmap or vector and finally information may come in 'strings' or for short 'text'"
Now i know there are countless errors in this proberly but then the guy said this to me;
This is not your work; you clearly copy + pasted it. Delete this now or explain to me what 32bit is
I know what it is but its sorta hard to explain when your in pressure; then he arranged me to meet the headteacher (principal), gave me an [b]F[/b] and kicked me out the class. I have countless witnesses that i didnt c + p anything but his an fuckhead, i have an meeting with the headteacher soon, i have no idea what to tell her. any thoughts?

item.title: In trouble for being more advanced then my ICT teacher
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:18, topic:345469”][quote author=pure2ownage link=topic=441847.msg3245577#msg3245577 date=1277327634]

Tbh, the entire situation just sounds like the teacher doesn’t like you. I had a computer class in 8th grade, and I was over-all better on the computer than her, but she accepted that, and graded me like she did the others still.
[/quote]Lulz
and he dont probs like me cause i swear to him and put glue on his seat

That’s a better reason for you getting kicked out of the class.[/quote]He didn’t realise the glue; except that his pants was all white on his arse.
And his a dipstick as you see.

Read full topic
item.source: In trouble for being more advanced then my ICT teacher

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:16, topic:345469”][quote author=pure2ownage link=topic=441847.msg3245458#msg3245458 date=1277319380]

You use “an” to much instead of “a”.
but on topic, if u didnt copy and paste u should be able to explain yourself.
[/quote]thats when im typing fast; and i dont know how to explain the words i just know the definition off head.

offtopic: i like your name

Ah, i see. well Goodluck

and thanks.[/quote]thnx
Plan A: CoonHunter’s suggestion
If it fails or anything else happens ima do jmood128’s suggestion

item.title: In trouble for being more advanced then my ICT teacher
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:12, topic:345469”][quote author=pure2ownage link=topic=441847.msg3245458#msg3245458 date=1277319380]

You use “an” to much instead of “a”.
but on topic, if u didnt copy and paste u should be able to explain yourself.
[/quote]thats when im typing fast; and i dont know how to explain the words i just know the definition off head.

offtopic: i like your name

I know how you feel. I have the problem of not being able to explain things, but I do know what it is. I just can’t decide how to best fit it into the right words.

ONTOPIC: Lol’d at that, he cannot accuse you of C+P’ing without proof, otherwise he has no real evidence. In the court of law, this would be shot down. Its like saying, I know you killed that man, and yet I have no real evidence to prove it was you in the first place.

Bad analogy, but you should be able to get what I mean.[/quote]I do; but its fucked cause he was watching me the whole time.

Read full topic

item.title: In trouble for being more advanced then my ICT teacher
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:6, topic:345469”]Tell that you program and they’ll understand. Then prove to them they you can program!
It looks like you c+p’d because who the fuck knows what 2^32 is of the top of their head, if you do then great but there’s no point!

ps, integers aren’t a type of information; they are a type of data so your wrong anyway.
and… signed integers go from (-)2^32 to (2^32)-1 because 0 is a number.[/quote]Lol ok and i stated i may be wrong; not the best guy here.

Read full topic
